Package org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam

Interface LegacySam

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.keypop.reader.selection.spi.SmartCard
public interface LegacySam extends org.eclipse.keypop.reader.selection.spi.SmartCard
Extends the SmartCard interface of the "Keypop Reader API" to provide additional functionality specific to Calypso legacy SAMs.

An instance of LegacySam is obtained by casting the SmartCard object from the selection process defined by the "Keypop Reader API".

It is a dynamic view of the SAM's content, regularly updated from the selection stage to the end of the transaction.

Since:
0.1.0

    • getCounter

      Integer getCounter(int counterNumber)
      Returns the value of a counter.
      Parameters:
      counterNumber - The number of the counter (in range [0..26]).
      Returns:
      Null if the counter value is not set.
      Since:
      0.1.0
      See Also:
      • LegacySamSelectionExtension.prepareReadCounterStatus(int)
      • ReadTransactionManager.prepareReadCounterStatus(int)

    • getSystemKeyParameter

      KeyParameter getSystemKeyParameter(SystemKeyType systemKeyType)
      Returns the parameters of the system key for the specified key type.
      Parameters:
      systemKeyType - The type of system key.
      Returns:
      Null if there is no parameter available for the specified key type.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided argument is null.
      Since:
      0.2.0
      See Also:
      • LegacySamSelectionExtension.prepareReadSystemKeyParameters(SystemKeyType)
      • ReadTransactionManager.prepareReadSystemKeyParameters(SystemKeyType)

    • getWorkKeyParameter

      KeyParameter getWorkKeyParameter(int recordNumber)
      Returns the parameters of the work key referenced by its record number.
      Parameters:
      recordNumber - The key record number (in range [1..126]).
      Returns:
      Null if there is no parameter available for the specified key record number.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided record number is out of range.
      Since:
      0.7.0
      See Also:
      • LegacySamSelectionExtension.prepareReadWorkKeyParameters(int)
      • ReadTransactionManager.prepareReadWorkKeyParameters(int)

    • getWorkKeyParameter

      KeyParameter getWorkKeyParameter(byte kif, byte kvc)
      Returns the parameters of the work key referenced by its KIF and KVC.
      Parameters:
      kif - The key KIF.
      kvc - The key KVC.
      Returns:
      Null if there is no parameter available for the specified KIF/KVC.
      Since:
      0.7.0
      See Also:
      • LegacySamSelectionExtension.prepareReadWorkKeyParameters(byte, byte)
      • ReadTransactionManager.prepareReadWorkKeyParameters(byte, byte)
